activities: Holden receives personal information directly from end users who fill out our "contact me" online form, from users' employers who set up user accounts in our software on the users' behalf, and from third-party mailing list providers. We use mailing-list and user-provided information for marketing and research purposes, and user accounts for access to our software. We limit the personal information in all cases to the minimum required for the tasks at hand; i.e., email addresses in the case of user accounts and email addresses, mailing addresses, and phone numbers in the case of marketing data. Except when the user’s email address is also used as the user’s authentication ID, users are not compelled to provide any personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data, offline data, and manually-processed data: email addresses, mailing addresses, phone numbers
